items.name: esgroupOnActive
items.title: Easysocial Group For Active Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the Easysocial groups that the user should be assigned to when the subscription is active

items.name: esgroupOnHold
items.title: Easysocial Group For On Hold Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the Easysocial groups that the user should be assigned to when the subscription is on hold

items.name: esgroupOnExpire
items.title: Easysocial Group For Expire Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the Easysocial groups that the user should be assigned to when the subscription is expire

items.name: removeFromGroup
items.title: Forcefully Remove Easysocial Group
items.tooltip: Determine if the system should forcefully remove all of the selected Easysocial Group from the user once the user subscription become active
